action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a grid of colored blocks. There are four blocks in total, arranged in a 2x2 grid. The top-left block is green, the top-right block is purple, the bottom-left block is orange, and the bottom-right block is pink.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a series of colored blocks arranged in a pattern. The blocks are in shades of green, purple, and orange. The pattern includes a cross shape made of purple blocks, followed by a series of green blocks, and then an orange block. To the right, there is a pink block with a smaller purple block on top.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a grid of colored blocks. There are four blocks in total, arranged in a 2x2 grid. The top-left block is green, the top-right block is purple, the bottom-left block is orange, and the bottom-right block is pink.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: What is the color of the top-right block in your image?

The pattern includes a cross shape made of purple blocks, followed by a series of green blocks, and then an orange block. To the right, there is a pink block with a smaller purple block on top.
